workflow_name: BidWin AI Enterprise Knowledge & Governance Platform

knowledge_base.name: Knowledge Vault
knowledge_base.description: Enterprise knowledge base containing verified policies, security protocols, and approved messaging for RFP responses and compliance auditing

agents.name: Bid Generator Agent
agents.description: Searches Knowledge Vault for relevant content, generates balanced/professional responses using only verified context, returns 'Information Missing' warning when topic not covered, includes source citations

agents.name: Compliance Auditor Agent
agents.description: Analyzes draft text sentence-by-sentence against Knowledge Vault, classifies each as VERIFIED/UNKNOWN/CONTRADICTION, calculates compliance percentage score, flags risks appropriately
